/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and towering buildings, creating a vibrant contrast against the clear blue sky dotted with fluffy white clouds. In the distance, majestic mountains rise, adding a touch of nature's grandeur to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the vastness of the sky. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees and the blue of the sky standing out prominently.
